parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns zeroing of unit's weapon.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[currentZeroing]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - Unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value> object [[currentZeroing]] [weaponClass, muzzleClass] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - Unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> weaponClass: [[String]] - Class name of weapon

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> muzzleClass: [[String]]  -  (Optional, default currently active muzzle or first that is found) - Class name of the muzzle

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] in format:
* 0: [[Number]] - Distance
* 1: [[Number]] - zeroingIndex
** 0 ≙ 50 m
** 1 ≙ 100 m
** 2 ≙ 150 m
** ...

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _zeroing = [[currentZeroing]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>([[player]] [[currentZeroing]] ["arifle_MX_GL_F", "GL_3GL_F"]) [[params]] ["_zeroingIndex", "_distance"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setWeaponZeroing]]
</value></part></template></root>
